subject: Re: Re: Springs included?
description_text:
Hello,

I saw this order says it was shipped 3 days ago, but the tracking still
only says that the label was created and it's not on the way yet. The
expected delivery was supposed to be yesterday.

I'm just curious when I can expect these pedals to arrive? I'm very
excited, thank you!

On Wed, May 28, 2025, 10:10 PM Sander Luik <blacklabel2201@gmail.com> wrote:

> Hello,
>
> Ok thank you for clarifying! I'm more interested in having the springs day
> one to setup the pedals exactly how I want without having to wait on
> shipping. Is there a way to either add those to my existing order or just
> add the discount code? I think cost would be about the same either way.
> Just curious, I ordered the pedals too quick in my excitement. thank you!
>
> On Wed, May 28, 2025, 9:53 PM support@simsonn.com <support@simsonn.com>
> wrote:
>
>> Hello,
>> The pedals come with the black spring by default. The colored springs
>> shown on our website are optional accessories and are not included in the
>> kit.
>> That said, we provide a variety of damper stiffness options along with up
>> to 13 adjustment spacers, which allow for a wide range of brake feel
>> customization.
>> We recommend giving the included setup a try first — you may find there's
>> no need to purchase the colored springs.
>> Thanks again for your support!
>>
>> ------------------------------
>> support@simsonn.com
>>
>>
>> *From:* Sander Luik <blacklabel2201@gmail.com>
>> *Date:* 2025-05-29 11:47
>> *To:* support <support@simsonn.com>
>> *Subject:* Re: Re: Springs included?
>> Hello, thank you for getting back to me!
>>
>> So the other colored springs on your site wouldn't work for the brake? Or
>> do the pedals come with them so I have the option to change out the firmess
>> of the spring itself?
>> And is it too late to add the discount code? I assume so but wanted to
>> ask.
>>
>> On Wed, May 28, 2025, 9:44 PM support@simsonn.com <support@simsonn.com>
>> wrote:
>>
>>> Hello,
>>> Yes, the current difference between the Plus X and the Pro X is mainly
>>> the lighting and the adjustable brake dampener. Mechanically, they are
>>> otherwise the same.
>>> As for the short springs you mentioned — they are already pre-installed
>>> on your pedal. Each spring is 16.5mm in length and includes a 10mm thick
>>> internal spacer, which helps further reduce the spring travel for a more
>>> compact and responsive feel.
>>> Thank you for your support!
>>>
>>> ------------------------------
>>> support@simsonn.com
>>>
>>>
>>> *From:* Sander Luik <blacklabel2201@gmail.com>
>>> *Date:* 2025-05-28 09:47
>>> *To:* support <support@simsonn.com>
>>> *Subject:* Re: Springs included?
>>> Hello,
>>>
>>> Just wanted to circle back as I haven't heard from you? Thank you!
>>>
>>> On Mon, May 26, 2025, 11:09 PM Sander Luik <blacklabel2201@gmail.com>
>>> wrote:
>>>
>>>> Of course,
>>>>
>>>> Order #SSN1540
>>>>
>>>> On Mon, May 26, 2025, 11:08 PM support@simsonn.com <support@simsonn.com>
>>>> wrote:
>>>>
>>>>>
>>>>> Hello, can you help with the order number?
>>>>> ------------------------------
>>>>> support@simsonn.com
>>>>>
>>>>>
>>>>> *From:* Sander Luik <blacklabel2201@gmail.com>
>>>>> *Date:* 2025-05-27 12:25
>>>>> *To:* support <support@simsonn.com>
>>>>> *Subject:* Springs included?
>>>>> Hello,
>>>>>
>>>>> I just ordered a Plus X pedal kit from you and had 2 questions.
>>>>>
>>>>> Is the Plus X the same as the Pro X just without the lighting and the
>>>>> adjustable brake dampener or are there any mechanical differences as well?
>>>>>
>>>>> Also, are the Short springs you list on your accessories page included
>>>>> with the pedal packaging? The ones called "Sprung", The ones for the brake
>>>>> pedal.
>>>>> I see no mention of it in your description and think they'd be a good
>>>>> help.
>>>>>
>>>>> Thank you!
>>>>>
>>>>> Sincerely,
>>>>> Sander
>>>>>
>>>>>

conversations.body_text: Hi Sander Luik, We see that the PlusX pedal has been delivered. Please kindly confirm.

Hello,

They haven't arrived and the tracking shows they still haven't even been
shipped, just the label created.

Here's the tracking number and a screenshot.

1ZK6B4420304049784





On Sun, Jun 8, 2025, 10:04 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Sander Luik,   The email replies have been quite numerous and somewhat confusing. I see that order 1540 has been delivered; please kindly confirm. Also, you mentioned the tracking number 1ZK6B4420304049784 has no shipping information—could you please let us know which product this tracking number corresponds to?

Hello,

1540 is my order number, but nothing's arrived yet.

The tracking number I sent is for order 1540, for my plus x pedals. That
ups tracking number came from an email sent by your system, telling me my
order has shipped. But the tracking history shows ups has still not
received it, only a label has been made.




On Sun, Jun 8, 2025, 10:12 PM support@simsonn.com

Hello,

I'm curious where you're seeing that it shows delivered. Could you provide
me with your info?
Thank you!

Hi Sander Luik,  The Plus X pedal you purchased is our newest model and is not yet in stock at our US warehouse, so we can only ship from China. We have created a logistics number for the US shipment, but the shipment is still on the plane to the US, logistics will be updated when ups receives the shipment. It is expected to arrive for you around the 12th, sorry for the delay. Sincerely apologise!

Hello,

No worries, sounds good! Thank you for the update

On Mon, Jun 9, 2025, 4:45 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi，Sander Luik，    Thank you so much for your understanding!
